title: How to Make a Cachaca Mojito

steps.headline: In the bottom of a highball glass, muddle the lime quarters, sugar and mint leaves until the limes have released their juice and the mint has released its aroma.
Add the cachaca and a few ice cubes.
Top off the rest of the drink with club soda.
Stir the drink and garnish it with a wedge of lime.

text: In the bottom of a highball glass, muddle the lime quarters, sugar and mint leaves until the limes have released their juice and the mint has released its aroma.  Add the cachaca and a few ice cubes.  Top off the rest of the drink with club soda.  Stir the drink and garnish it with a wedge of lime.
